headline: LLM SEO for the Age of AI Search
subheadline: Monitor, analyze, and optimize how large language models perceive your brand across AI assistants.

hero_secondary.label: Overview
hero_secondary.title: Own Your Brand in the AI Era
hero_secondary.description: Percepta helps you see what ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini say about your company — and gives you the insights to shape it. Track mentions, compare competitors, and guide your brand narrative where it matters most.

sections.title: Why Percepta?
sections.subtitle: Percepta vs. Traditional SEO Tools
sections.text: Search engines are no longer the gatekeepers — language models are. Traditional SEO tools stop at Google rankings; Percepta measures your true presence in AI-driven answers.

comparison_points.title: AI Visibility
comparison_points.description: Traditional SEO tracks keywords. Percepta tracks what AI models actually say about your brand.

comparison_points.title: Competitor Insights
comparison_points.description: See how LLMs compare your brand to competitors — across industries and regions.

comparison_points.title: Narrative Control
comparison_points.description: Detect misinformation or outdated AI content and guide updates with verified sources.

comparison_points.title: Real-Time Monitoring
comparison_points.description: Unlike web crawlers, Percepta queries LLMs live, measuring brand perception continuously.

comparison_points.title: Cross-Model Coverage
comparison_points.description: Google Gemini, ChatGPT, Claude, Mistral — your brand should look good everywhere.

comparison_points.title: Business Impact
comparison_points.description: Correlate AI perception scores with real business outcomes and trust metrics.

sections.label: Features
sections.title: Built for Brand and Growth Teams
sections.subtitle: Everything you need to track, measure, and influence AI visibility
bullets: Live AI Query Engine — Continuously test what LLMs say about your company.
Competitor Benchmarking — Compare brand tone, mentions, and accuracy side by side.
Perception Analytics — Measure how AI ranks your credibility, trust, and relevance.
Alert System — Get notified when models mention outdated or incorrect data.
LLM Optimization Toolkit — Generate model-friendly content and citations for AI retraining pipelines.

sections.label: How It Works
sections.title: From Query to Insight
sections.text: Percepta continuously queries top LLMs with real-world prompts, aggregates brand responses, and ranks results by tone, accuracy, and visibility. You get a dashboard that shows your perception footprint and opportunities to improve it.

sections.label: Get Started
sections.title: Join the LLM SEO Beta
sections.text: We’re working with select marketing, PR, and SEO teams to shape the future of brand visibility in AI-driven search. Apply now to join our closed beta and gain early access to perception analytics.

items.question: What is LLM SEO?
items.answer: LLM SEO focuses on how AI models describe your brand instead of how search engines rank it. It’s the future of brand visibility.

items.question: Which models does Percepta monitor?
items.answer: Currently: ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, and Perplexity. We’re expanding coverage monthly.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. Queries are anonymized and encrypted. We never store sensitive brand or client data.

items.question: Who should use Percepta?
items.answer: Marketing teams, agencies, and PR firms who want to understand and influence how AI talks about them.
